div.p: How resource references can be aggregated
This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/resource-aggregation-mode

tr.td: The reference is a local reference to a contained resource.
The reference to to a resource that has to be resolved externally to the resource that includes the reference.
The resource the reference points to will be found in the same bundle as the resource that includes the reference.
